amendment.description: Amendment streamlines the individualized rehabilitation plan for employment; provides for informed choice throughout the vocational rehabilitation process; allows services to individuals whose vocational goal is self-employment or business ownership; and requires that Federal agencies provide certification of compliance with electronic and information technology accessibility guidelines.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make a number of modifications to the vocational rehabilitation provisions of the bill, including permitting local rehabilitation programs to promote self-employment programs, requiring federal agencies to establish proceedures to comply with electronic and information technology guidelines, providing clients with greater choice of services, and promoting efforts to recruit and train vocational rehabilitation professionals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
